Adding servers

There are two methods of adding servers:

  • Manually add information for one server at a time.

  • Import a CSV (comma-separated values) file with information for one server in each row.

    The CSV file must have the following headings, in the order specified: Server Name, Description, IPAddress, OSType, WWNs (comma separated list of WWNs). All fields are required except Description.

Procedure

  1. On the Storage Advisor dashboard, click Servers. Then click the plus sign (+) to open the Add Server page.
  2. On the Add Server page, do one of the following:

    • Click the upper plus sign (+) to browse for the CSV file or drag the file to the plus sign. The values from the file will populate the page.

    • Click the plus sign (+) in the table to add a row and enter a Server Name, Description (optional), IP Address, OS Type, and WWN. You can add more servers by clicking the plus sign.

  3. Click Submit to add the servers.

Results

A job is started to add the servers.

Next steps

Create volumes and attach them to the server.
